item.title: Qualcomm’s RSI Just Hit Its High of the Year—Why That’s Bullish
item.description: Qualcomm’s RSI just hit its highest in over a year. With strong fundamentals and bullish analyst support, a breakout above $170 looks likely.

item.title: 2 Ways to Trade Amazon Ahead of October’s Prime Day
item.description: Investors have two clear options heading into Amazon's Prime Day: buy the dip now or wait for a confirmed breakout above $240.
